title: I have lvl 4. (CM)
body:
I have lvl 4 mastery with some champions but its not giving me the custom emote + the Banner.
Bug?
EDIT:
I just tried using the emote in game and I got noting.
Im submitting a ticket to let riot know of this bug.

replies.body: You get the emote + banner at lvl 4, just better ones at lvl 5.

> [{quoted}](name=Best Burrito AU,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=YpARuAXH,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-12T02:33:35.810+0000)
>
> Isn't there 5 levels?

what's your point? you get the emote at rank 4
